entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.2°C

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light early in the afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 March 2023
